      • getTree

        public HierarchicalCentroidCluster<T> getTree()
        Returns a LengthWeightHierarchyNode representing the root of the computed clustering tree. Only valid after performClustering() has been run.
        Returns:
        a LengthWeightHierarchyNode representing the root of the computed clustering tree, or null if the clustering procedure has not been performed yet.
